goal.ch: 本課程旨在為研究生提供應用數學的必要知識，這些知識可應用於力學、電學和應用科學的各個方面。
goal.en: This course is designed to equip graduate students with essential knowledge in applied mathematics, applicable across various fields including mechanics, electricity, and applied science.

outline.ch:
1. Cartesian Tensor
2. Eigenvalue problem
3. Ordinary differential equation-initial value problem
4. Ordinary differential equation-boundary value problem
5. Ordinary differential equation-Green‘s function
6. Partial differential equation-Green‘s function
7. Partial differential equation-eigenfunction expansion

textbook.ch:
(1) H. Jeffreys, “Cartesian tensors,“ 7th ed., Cambridge Univ. Press, 1968.
(2) Y. C. Fung, “A first course in continuum mechanics,“ Prentice-Hall, 1969.
(3) G. Birkho and G. C. Rota, “Ordinary Differential Equations,“ 4th ed. John Wiley ＆ Sons, 1989.
(5) F. Brauer J. A. Nohel, “Ordinary Differential Equations,“ Benjamin Inc., 1967.
(6) I. Stakgold, “Green‘s Functions and Boundary Value Problems,“ John Wiley ＆ Sons., 1979.
(7) M. W. Hirsch and S. Smale, “Differential Equations, Dynamical Systems, and Linear Algebra,“ Academic Press, 1974.
(8) W. E. Williams,“Partial differential equations,” Oxford University Press, 1980.
